test_description: Verify PostGIS ST_Contains query correctly identifies Service Center coverage for a given User coordinate
business_risk: Critical - Incorrect routing leads to service delays and SLA breaches
preconditions: PostGIS database seeded with Service Center polygons; Redis state initialized
test_steps: 1. Define Service Center A polygon (Active); 2. Define Service Center B polygon (Active); 3. Submit Service Request with coords inside Center A; 4. Submit Service Request with coords inside Center B; 5. Submit Service Request outside all polygons
expected_result: Request 1 routes to Center A; Request 2 routes to Center B; Request 3 triggers fallback/manual review logic
test_data_needs: GeoJSON polygon payloads; Mock User Coordinates
environment_requirements: Integration Env with PostGIS extension enabled
success_criteria: Routing decision < 200ms; 100% accuracy on boundary edge cases

test_description: Verify WatermelonDB sync queue replays requests sequentially upon network restoration
business_risk: High - Data loss for field technicians
preconditions: Mobile app authenticated; Network disconnected (Airplane Mode)
test_steps: 1. Disable Network; 2. Technician updates Job A status to 'In Progress'; 3. Technician adds Note to Job B; 4. Enable Network; 5. Monitor Sync Queue processing
expected_result: Job A update sent first; Job B note sent second; Local queue cleared; Backend reflects changes
test_data_needs: Mock Mobile State; API Mocks for Backend
environment_requirements: Mobile Emulator with Network Throttling capability
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Correct order of operations

test_description: Validate battery drain and update frequency of background geolocation service over 4 hours
business_risk: Medium - Technician device battery drain leading to app abandonment
preconditions: Physical Device (iOS & Android); Travel Mode Activated
test_steps: 1. Charge device to 100%; 2. Activate Travel Mode; 3. Background the app; 4. Simulate movement (drive/walk) for 4 hours; 5. Measure battery level; 6. Verify WebSocket packet frequency
expected_result: Battery drain < 15% over 4 hours; Updates received every ~30s
test_data_needs: Physical movement or GPX file replay
tools_required: Physical Devices; Battery Profiler; Wireshark (Network Analysis)
success_criteria: Updates persist in background mode; Battery drain within limits
